title: Dynamite Studio, 1 Bath in Lincoln Park, Available: Now
posting_body: Charming, brand new gut rehabbed, studio in Lincoln Park features rehabbed kitchen with modern white cabinets, subway tile back splash, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, open living area, individually controlled heat and AC, amazing closet space with built in organizers, beautiful dark hardwood floors, rehabbed bathroom, in unit laundry, and small pets are welcome.
Building features bike room, fitness center, package receiving room, and elevator!
Steps to Clark Street shopping, bars, and restaurants, and short walk to the Lake!
Please Call Aleksandra Chadiev at 224/322-5494‬ to schedule an appointment to view this apartment and mention Apartment ID: 46161.
